properties.entry: SELECT SHOPPING_NO, SHOPPING_TITLE, EMPLOYEE_NM, READ_COUNT, CASE WHEN SYSDATE - CREATE_DT < 1/24/60 THEN FLOOR((SYSDATE - CREATE_DT) * 24 * 60 * 60) || '초 전' WHEN SYSDATE - CREATE_DT < 1/24 THEN FLOOR((SYSDATE - CREATE_DT) * 24 * 60) || '분 전' WHEN SYSDATE - CREATE_DT < 1 THEN FLOOR((SYSDATE - CREATE_DT) * 24) || '시간 전' ELSE TO_CHAR(CREATE_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') END CREATE_DT, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM COM C WHERE C.SHOPPING_NO = S.SHOPPING_NO) COM_COUNT FROM SHOPPING S JOIN EMPLOYEE USING(EMPLOYEE_NO) WHERE DELETE_FL = 'N' ORDER BY SHOPPING_NO DESC

SELECT SHOPPING_NO, SHOPPING_TITLE, SHOPPING_CONTENT, EMPLOYEE_NO, EMPLOYEE_NM, READ_COUNT, TO_CHAR(CREATE_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') CREATE_DT FROM SHOPPING JOIN EMPLOYEE USING(EMPLOYEE_NO) WHERE DELETE_FL = 'N' AND SHOPPING_NO = ?
UPDATE SHOPPING SET READ_COUNT = READ_COUNT + 1 WHERE SHOPPING_NO = ?
UPDATE SHOPPING SET SHOPPING_TITLE = ?, SHOPPING_CONTENT = ? WHERE SHOPPING_NO = ?
UPDATE SHOPPING SET DELETE_FL = 'Y' WHERE SHOPPING_NO = ?
INSERT INTO SHOPPING(SHOPPING_NO, SHOPPING_TITLE, SHOPPING_CONTENT, EMPLOYEE_NO) VALUES(?, ?, ?, ?)

SELECT SHOPPING_NO, SHOPPING_TITLE, EMPLOYEE_NM, READ_COUNT, CASE WHEN SYSDATE - CREATE_DT < 1/24/60 THEN FLOOR((SYSDATE - CREATE_DT) * 24 * 60 * 60) || '초 전' WHEN SYSDATE - CREATE_DT < 1/24 THEN FLOOR((SYSDATE - CREATE_DT) * 24 * 60) || '분 전' WHEN SYSDATE - CREATE_DT < 1 THEN FLOOR((SYSDATE - CREATE_DT) * 24) || '시간 전' ELSE TO_CHAR(CREATE_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') END CREATE_DT, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM COM C WHERE C.SHOPPING_NO = S.SHOPPING_NO) COM_COUNT FROM SHOPPING S JOIN EMPLOYEE USING(EMPLOYEE_NO) WHERE DELETE_FL = 'N'
